page.title: 09Lewisham Weather
page.content: Lewisham is miserable, when it rains, the dirt mingles, the rubbish is soaked, umbrella's everywhere, red, pink, brown, black all colours of the rainbow, points waving in the air, everyone rushes home. Lewisham is bright and cheerful, when the sun shines, smiles all around, beach coloured clothes, everywhere, people relax walking happily about, but when it snows, lewisham is heaven, except the roads,the snow is like a lace curtain smothering the roofs houses, grass, people throw snow at each other, remembering their childhoods, the roads are brown, slush, slodgy. Erhh. The snow turns to ice people falling over, breaking arms, legs, and tempers, and slowly the snow, disapear, and it rains again, THE END
